xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/274511-Bob Wilson's Life & Death of Marina Abramovic 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3k0Htl0eSLWXp3yWBCMWyDefjjF.jpg This hourlong semi-documentary records the musical stage collaboration between director Robert Wilson and veteran performance artist Marina Abramovic. Also included is a wealth of background material about Abramovic's life and earlier works. Bob Wilson's Life & Death of Marina Abramovic
